com.beepell.repository
Class SchemaRepository

java.lang.Object
  com.beepell.repository.SchemaRepository

public class SchemaRepository
extends Object

A repository for receiving and containing definitions written in the XML Schema language. This is implemented using the XML Schema Object Model, XSOM. Note that, process definitions does not share repositories. Different process definitions may use different versions of definitions in the namespace.

Author:
Tim Hallwyl

initialize

private void initialize()
                 throws SAXException
This method initialize the XSOM schema set and Schema, if it is not initialized already. When this is done no more schemas can be added. This is method is called in all request methods.

Throws:
SAXException
